// Define the prop types for the component
interface ImageDisplayProps {
 src: string;
 fileName: string;
}

const ImageDisplay: React.FC<ImageDisplayProps> = ({ src, fileName }) => {
 const [isLoaded, setIsLoaded] = useState(false);
 const [isError, setIsError] = useState(false);
 const [isExpanded, setIsExpanded] = useState(false);

 // Placeholder and fallback images
 const placeholderImage = 'https://via.placeholder.com/150';
 const fallbackImage = 'https://via.placeholder.com/150/FF0000/FFFFFF?text=Error';

 // Handle image loading
 const handleImageLoad = () => {
 setIsLoaded(true);
 };

 const handleImageError = () => {
 setIsError(true);
 };

 // Handle image expansion
 const toggleExpand = () => {
 setIsExpanded(!isExpanded);
 };

 // Handle image download
 const handleDownload = async () => {
 try {
 const response = await fetch(src);
 const blob = await response.blob();
 const url = window.URL.createObjectURL(blob);
 const a = document.createElement('a');
 a.href = url;
 a.download = fileName;
 document.body.appendChild(a);
 a.click();
 a.remove();
 window.URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
 } catch (error) {
 console.error('Download failed:', error);
 }
 };

 return (
 <div className="image-display">
 <div
 className={`image-container ${isExpanded ? 'expanded' : ''}`}
 onClick={toggleExpand}
 role="button"
 tabIndex={0}
 onKeyPress={(e) => e.key === 'Enter' && toggleExpand()}
 >
 <img
 src={isError ? fallbackImage : src}
 alt="Display"
 onLoad={handleImageLoad}
 onError={handleImageError}
 style={{ display: isLoaded ? 'block' : 'none' }}
 />
 {!isLoaded && <img src={placeholderImage} alt="Loading..." />}
 </div>
 <button onClick={handleDownload} className="download-button">
 Download
 </button>

 {/* Modal for expanded view */}
 {isExpanded && (
 <div className="modal" onClick={toggleExpand}>
 <img src={isError ? fallbackImage : src} alt="Expanded View" />
 </div>
 )}

 <style jsx>{`
 .image-display {
 position: relative;
 text-align: center;
 }
 .image-container {
 cursor: pointer;
 transition: transform 0.3s ease;
 }
 .image-container.expanded {
 position: fixed;
 top: 0;
 left: 0;
 width: 100%;
 height: 100%;
 background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
 display: flex;
 justify-content: center;
 align-items: center;
 z-index: 1000;
 }
 .modal {
 position: fixed;
 top: 0;
 left: 0;
 width: 100%;
 height: 100%;
 background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
 display: flex;
 justify-content: center;
 align-items: center;
 z-index: 1000;
 }
 .download-button {
 margin-top: 10px;
 padding: 10px 20px;
 font-size: 16px;
 cursor: pointer;
 }
 `}</style>
 </div>
 );
};

export default ImageDisplay;","paramValue":""}]},{"promptName":"react_image_component","commandName":"react_image_component_develop","shortDescription":"To implement a image display component that should seamlessly download the image and should show the loader till the image downloaded.
